|brand = D-Link |model = DAP-3310 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = A1 (RU) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = KA2AP3310A1,SCDOW141000001 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR1321;AR1321-AL1A; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = <!-- 533 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;; |fla1chipmodelfull = <!-- Flash1 full chip info --> |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = Zentel;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = 48 |pwr_poe_amp = 0.5 |pwr_conn = Ethernet (PoE)
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.0.50 |defaultlogin = Admin |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = common |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/09/2013 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Business-Class Environment
2.4 GHz 802.11n Connectivity for Increased Network Capacity :High Power Radio Design, Built-in High Gain Sector Antenna
10dBi internal MIMO antenna, Waterproof IPX6 Standard :PoE Pass-through, the default SSID may be '''dlink'''
*''[[LanReady]]'' WCB1105H10DX AP Router FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/SCDOW141000001 SCDOW141000001] :Model: DAP-3310-RU
==See also== *[[D-Link DAP-2330 rev A1|DAP-2330 A1]] - KA2AP2330A1 QCA9557 @720 64/16 SOC@26dBm :b/g/n 2x2:2 1 1 1 LAN WAN 12V/1A POE GbE switch *[[D-Link DAP-2660 rev A1|DAP-2660 A1]] - KA2AP2660A1 QCA9557 @720 128/16 SOC@26dBm :QCA9882 @26dBm a/b/g/n/ac 2x2:2 1 1 1 LAN WAN 12V/1A POE GbE *[[D-Link DAP-3310 rev A1|DAP-3310 A1]]- SCDOW141000001 Atheros AR1321 @400 32/8 SOC@10dBm :b/g/n 2x2:2 1 1 2 LAN WAN POE Int. 10dBi sector ant. *DAP-2230 - b/g/n 2x2 SOC@26dBm *DAP-3320 - KA2AP3320A1 (06/22/2015) b/g/n 2x2:2 POE *DAP-3410 - SCDOW161000001 Atheros AR9342 @560 32/8 SOC@15dBm :a/n 2x2:2 1 1 2 LAN WAN POE Int. 15dBI sector ant. *DAP-3520 A1 - KA2AP3520A1 (02/24/2009) *DAP-3662 A1 - KA2AP3662A1 QCA9557 @720 128/16 SOC@26dBm :QCA9882 @26dBm a/b/g/n/ac 2x2:2 1 1 2 LAN WAN 48V/0.5A *[[D-Link DAP-3760 rev A1|DAP-3760 A1]] - KA2AP3760A1 (05/26/2009) *[[D-Link DAP-3760 rev B1|DAP-3760 B1]] - KA2AP3760B1 (10/19/2010) *[[D-Link DAP-3860 rev A1|DAP-3860 A1]] (B1) - KA2AP3860B1 (10/19/2010)
